result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Christopher L. Huggins

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Clerk Cheree
Cases 15CF99, 15CF160, 15CF394 and 15CF186 called: 9:40am
State appears by ADA K.Mayo.  Def appears in person and with Atty Mcfarland.  
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed.  VR not applicable

State moves to:
15CF99 - Cts 2 and 3>>D&RI
15CF160 - Cts 2 and 3>>D&RI
15CF186>>D&RI entire file
15CF394 - Cts 2 and 3>>D&RI
COURT GRANTS ABOVE

PLEA:
15CF99 - Ct. 1 (Poss Methamphet)>>NO CONTEST
15CF160 - Ct. 1 (Felony BJ)>>NO CONTEST
15CF394 - Ct. 1 (Felony BJ)>>NO CONTEST

COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  

COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty

COURT ORDERS: Sentence W/held on all 3 counts; 2 years probation on each count, concurrent
CONDITIONS: Any assessment/treatment/counseling as deemed appropriate by PO; GFE to obtain/maintain FTE/FT schooling or combination thereof; AODA and any follow up recommended; Absolute sobriety; CC; DNA sample and surcharge; In 15CF99 Ct. 1 only --30 days MCJ w/huber for work/treatment if defendant qualifies under jail classification system, with no credit for any time served.

In the event of revocation, defendant is entitled to the following credit for time already served:  15CF99 - 3 days credit;  15CF160 - 2 days credit; 15CF394 - no credit.

Adj: 9:50am

Clerk Cheree
Cases 15CF99, 15CF160, 15CF186, 15CF394 called: 1:14pm
State appears by ADA K.Mayo; Defendant appears in person and with Atty 
(Adjourned IA and waiver of PH on 15CF394 only --  all other cases tracking)

IA in 15CF394>>
W/R R/J

Waiver of Prelim. filed.  
Court questions deft as to waiver.
Court finds waiver freely and voluntarily made.
COURT finds PC - Defendant bound over for arraignment & trial.  
Information to be filed today mirroring exactly the complaint.  Reading Waived.
Plea:  NOT GUILTY
Dates to be set immediately at the conclusion of this hearing for PTC or plea.

Bond>>$1000 signature; CONDITIONS: Absolute sobriety.
State notes discovery has been provided on all 3 older files and will be sent on new file very soon.

Adj: 1:17pm

Clerk Cheree
Cases 15CF99, 15CF186, 15CF160 Called: 2:30pm
State appears by ADA C.Minder; Deft appears in person with Atty Erik Mcfarland
Waivers of Prelim. filed in all 3 cases.  

Court questions deft as to waivers.
Court finds waivers freely and voluntarily made.
COURT finds PC in each file - Defendant bound over for arraignments & trials.  
Informations filed.  Readings Waived.
Plea:  NOT GUILTY on all counts
PTC to be set 

Atty Mcfarland requests no contact w/defendant's girlfriend be lifted as part of bond (in 2 newer files); State takes no position; COURT vacates the no contact provision with A..S. in two newer files.

Adj: 2:40pm

No contact with victim(s):  A.S. (waiveable).  Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney.
